## Spirit of the Books

This is the spirit of the books, breathed into the Most Exalted Pen, and all of creation has been thunderstruck, except those who have been touched by the breezes of My mercy and the sweet fragrances of the Most Glorious One, which dominate all the worlds.

## Dove of Praise

When the Dove of Praise takes flight from the bough of glorification and seeks the most distant and hidden destination
